alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 16 at 12:00AM AKDT until October 16 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow, blowing snow and freezing rain expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting 30 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow mixed with freezing rain will continue through Monday morning. Strong winds could produce reduced visibility in blowing snow. Winds will decrease, and snow and blowing snow will end Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
